headline: Can Pfizer’s Recent Recovery Signal a Long Term Value Opportunity in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Pfizer is quietly turning into a value opportunity, or if the market is still too skeptical, you are not alone. That is exactly what this breakdown will unpack. After a rough few years, Pfizer's share price has ticked up 1.1% over the last week and 5.8% over the past month, even though it is still down 2.2% year to date and 40.1% over three years, with a modest 8.5% gain over the last year. Recent sentiment has been shaped by Pfizer's shifting pipeline strategy and portfolio...
